title: Textile, 19th–20th century
medium:
Medium: cotton
Technique: wax resist dyeing (batik) on plain weave
creditline: Gift of Mrs. Henry J. Bernheim
description: Brown cotton batik-printed with two repeats of rectangle edged with comb-like border and enclosing quatrefoild, circles, and dots in brown and reserved white on blue ground.
